I think I have just the right recommendation for you! Considering your interest in stories about servicemen, I highly recommend "Flags of Our Fathers" (2000). Directed by Clint Eastwood, this powerful drama tells the story of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima during World War II. With an impressive cast, including Ryan Phillippe and Jamie Bell, you'll be drawn into their heroic tales.

If that doesn't quite resonate with you, another option could be "Kingdom of Heaven" (2005). Set during the Crusades, this epic film follows Balian of Ibelin as he defends Jerusalem. With its rich historical context and stunning visuals, it might just become your new favorite war movie!
